processors.name: kilosort3
processors.help:
Kilosort3 is a spike sorting software package developed by Marius Pachitariu at Janelia Research Campus.
It uses a GPU-accelerated algorithm to detect, align, and cluster spikes across many channels.
Building on previous versions, Kilosort3 offers improved efficiency and accuracy in the extraction of neural spike waveforms from multichannel electrophysiological recordings.
By leveraging parallel processing capabilities of modern GPUs, it enables sorting with minimal manual intervention.
This tool has become an essential part of the workflow many electrophysiology labs.
For more information see https://github.com/MouseLand/Kilosort

parameters.name: electrical_series_path
parameters.help: Path to the electrical series in the NWB file, e.g., /acquisition/ElectricalSeries

parameters.name: detect_threshold
parameters.help: Threshold for spike detection

parameters.name: projection_threshold
parameters.help: Threshold on projections

parameters.name: preclust_threshold
parameters.help: Threshold crossings for pre-clustering (in PCA projection space)

parameters.name: car
parameters.help: Enable or disable common reference

parameters.name: minFR
parameters.help: Minimum spike rate (Hz), if a cluster falls below this for too long it gets removed

parameters.name: minfr_goodchannels
parameters.help: Minimum firing rate on a "good" channel

parameters.name: nblocks
parameters.help: blocks for registration. 0 turns it off, 1 does rigid registration. Replaces "datashift" option.

parameters.name: sig
parameters.help: spatial smoothness constant for registration

parameters.name: freq_min
parameters.help: High-pass filter cutoff frequency

parameters.name: sigmaMask
parameters.help: Spatial constant in um for computing residual variance of spike

parameters.name: nPCs
parameters.help: Number of PCA dimensions

parameters.name: ntbuff
parameters.help: Samples of symmetrical buffer for whitening and spike detection

parameters.name: nfilt_factor
parameters.help: Max number of clusters per good channel (even temporary ones) 4

parameters.name: do_correction
parameters.help: If True drift registration is applied

parameters.name: NT
parameters.help: Batch size (if -1 it is automatically computed)

parameters.name: AUCsplit
parameters.help: Threshold on the area under the curve (AUC) criterion for performing a split in the final step

parameters.name: wave_length
parameters.help: size of the waveform extracted around each detected peak, (Default 61, maximum 81)

parameters.name: keep_good_only
parameters.help: If True only "good" units are returned

parameters.name: skip_kilosort_preprocessing
parameters.help: Can optionaly skip the internal kilosort preprocessing

parameters.name: scaleproc
parameters.help: int16 scaling of whitened data, if -1 set to 200.

parameters.name: test_duration_sec
parameters.help: For testing purposes: duration of the recording in seconds (0 means all)

processors.name: ks3_quicktest
processors.help: For running tests. Runs Kilosort 3 with default parameters on the first portion of the recording.
